mapper.select: SELECT c.confirm_number, c.apply_dt, c.start_date, c.end_date, c.weekly_hours, c.regular_wage, c.child_name, c.child_resi_regi_number, c.child_birth_date, c.registration_number, c.name, c.response_name, c.response_phone_number, c.status_code, c.processor_id, c.center_id, c.user_id FROM TB_CONFIRM_APPLICATION c JOIN TB_TERM_AMOUNT t ON c.confirm_number = t.confirm_number WHERE c.confirm_number = #{confirmNumber} AND t.init_at = 'Y' AND NVL(c.delt_at, 'N') = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_CONFIRM_APPLICATION SET processor_id = #{processorId}, rejection_reason_code = #{rejectionReasonCode}, reject_comment = #{rejectComment}, status_code = #{statusCode} WHERE confirm_number = #{confirmNumber} AND status_code NOT IN ('ST_10', 'ST_50', 'ST_60', 'ST_70') AND NVL(delt_at,'N') = 'N'
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_CONFIRM_APPLICATION WHERE confirm_number = #{confirmNumber} AND status_code IN ('ST_50', 'ST_60') AND NVL(delt_at,'N') = 'N'

SELECT confirm_number, apply_dt, upd_start_date, upd_end_date, upd_weekly_hours, upd_regular_wage, upd_child_name, upd_child_resi_regi_number, upd_child_birth_date, upd_name, upd_registration_number, registration_number, name, response_name, response_phone_number, status_code, processor_id, center_id, user_id FROM TB_CONFIRM_APPLICATION WHERE confirm_number = #{confirmNumber} AND NVL(delt_at,'N') = 'N'
SELECT * FROM TB_TERM_AMOUNT WHERE confirm_number = #{confirmNumber} AND update_at = 'N'
SELECT * FROM TB_TERM_AMOUNT WHERE confirm_number = #{confirmNumber} AND update_at = 'Y'
